mapper.select: SELECT user_code, user_id, grade_code, area_city_code, user_pw, user_email, user_address, user_detail_address, user_phone, user_name, user_birth_date, user_gender, user_sign_date, user_update_date, user_delete_date, user_dormant_status, user_delete_status FROM `user` WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND grade_code='ugc1'
